#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
inline long long int inp()
{
long long int noRead=0;
char p=getchar_unlocked();
for(;p<33;){p=getchar_unlocked();};
while(p>32)
{
noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
p=getchar_unlocked();
}
return noRead;
};
int main()
{
    long long int n,t;
    t=inp();
    while(t--)
    {
              n=inp();
              if(n==1)
              cout<<"NO\n";
             else if(n==2)
              cout<<"YES\n";
              else if(n%4==1)
              cout<<"YES\n";
              else
              cout<<"NO\n";
    }
    return(0);
}
